entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
